name: DRAFT: Ai VistA IZ Gateway Test Script v0.4
description:
This test plan is to be used for provider onboarding testing to the Immunization Gateway developed under Contract-No: XXX-2020-XXXXX. IIS systems connecting to the provider are required to execute the following test cases:
1. Connect via the IZ Gateway using the IZ Gateway WSDL
2. Receive and respond to Vaccine Update Notifications (HL7 V2.5.1 VXU/Z22) 
2. Receive and respond to Query for Vaccine History  (Evaluated History and Forecast Group Z34/Z32) 

Provider systems are required to generate 10 test cases for both VXU and QBP as follows:
1. These messages must demonstrate conformance to the IZ Gateway Implementation Guide for Multi-Jurisdictional Providers by message validation without errors.
2. Interoperability testing with the partner IIS will be conducted using those same validated messages.

testCaseGroups.name: DAYSHR
testCaseGroups.description: This test group uses the VistA DAYSHR (Pre-32B) environment to test sending new vaccine administrations as historical doses

testCases.name: Test Case 1 DAYSHR
testCases.description: An 18-year old veteran is vaccinated with Haemophilus influenzae type b as a single dose.

testSteps.name: Provider Sends VXU for HX 18YO HIB
testSteps.description: Demonstrates the ability of the provider system to generate a VXU Test Message for an adult 18 year-old veteran being vaccinated with Haemophilus influenzae type b as a single dose formatted according to the IZ Gateway HL7 v2.5.1 IG for Multi-Jurisdiction Provider IZ Messaging.
